text: @cnnbrk Healthcare Workers Reform Act now! Healthcare workers are sued across the nation & others are quitting due to lawsuits. Healthcare workers: don't let the nation's gratitude divide you, what starts in nursing homes can end in hospitals. COVID-19 pathogenesis is still undetermined.
